data.title: Inside JCU
data.text:
March 21, 2022 FAC/STAFF

JCU FIT Healthy Cooking Demonstration

Please join JCU FIT and Parkhurst executive chef Craig Stevens for a healthy cooking demonstration. Attendees will get to experience firsthand how easy and fun healthy cooking can be, and will also have the opportunity to sample Chef Craig’s delicious and healthful grain bowl creation!

Continue reading this story

March 21, 2022 ALL

Loretta J. Mester, President and CEO of the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland, to Join Mellen Executive Speaker Series on March 22

The Edward J. and Louise E. Mellen Executive Speaker Series is excited to welcome Dr. Loretta J. Mester, President and Chief Executive Officer of the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland, as its spring speaker at John Carroll University.

Continue reading this story

March 21, 2022 ALL

Theology on Tap with John Scarano (FREE TACO BAR, BEER, WINE, AND FAIR TRADE T-SHIRTS))

Join Carroll Faith Communities for a social evening on Thursday, March 24 at 6:30pm in Jardine with our speaker John Scarano as he talks about his 40 year experience of faith and justice on a college campus.

Continue reading this story

March 20, 2022 ALL

Today: Nominate a student for the Leadership Legacy or Outstanding Student Leader Awards?

Each year, up to five graduating seniors are selected to receive the Leadership Legacy Award in honor of the contributions they have made to the JCU community during their time on campus. Additionally, up to two students per class year are recognized with the Outstanding Student Leader Award.

Please consider nominating students for these awards

Continue reading this story

March 20, 2022 ALL

Today: Porter Scholarship Applications Due March 21!

The College of Arts & Sciences invites you to apply for the Roderick Boyd Porter Memorial Scholarship, which is awarded annually to a John Carroll University undergraduate student for their contribution to the humanities. The scholarship award is $16,600, to be applied to your senior year tuition costs at JCU.

Continue reading this story

March 20, 2022 ALL

Today: Join us for the Grad at Grad Speaker Series!!

Join us in the O’Malley atrium on Monday, March 21st, for our first Grad at Grad Speaker event. Grad at Grad is a series of community events that highlight the stories of John Carroll’s senior class. The series gives seniors a place to share stories that have shaped them as Men and Women for and with others.

Continue reading this story

Mester, President and Chief Executive Officer of the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland, as its spring speaker at John Carroll University. Dr. Mester will deliver remarks and participate in a fireside chat on March 22, 2022 from 5:00-6:00 […]

March 19, 2022 ALL

Today: Free Throw Frenzy

Are you good at shooting foul shots? Come out to the Tony DeCarlo Varsity Center and prove your skills, by supporting the Women’s Club Basketball team on March 20th from 1-4 p.m. as we host the “Free Throw Frenzy!”
